subject: Mathematics
question_text: While preparing crystals of Mohr's salt, dil is added to a mixture of ferrous sulphate and ammonium sulphate, before dissolving this mixture in water, dil is added here to :

options.text: (1) prevent the hydrolysis of ferrous sulphate
(2) prevent the hydrolysis of ammonium sulphate
(4) increase the rate of formation of crystals
